pkgmetadata.longdescription: Confidence Intervals // Calculates classic and/or bootstrap confidence intervals for many parameters such as the population mean, variance, interquartile range (IQR), median absolute deviation (MAD), skewness, kurtosis, Cramer's V, R-squared, quantiles (incl. median), proportions, different types of correlation measures, difference in means, quantiles and medians. Many of the classic confidence intervals are described in Smithson, M. (2003, ISBN: 978-0761924999). Bootstrap confidence intervals are calculated with the R package 'boot'. Both one- and two-sided intervals are supported.
